text: committee established there is established a committee to study a committee to study the impacts of outdoor working conditions in new hampshire s heat and cold membership and compensation the members of the committee shall be as follows a three members of the house of representatives at lest one of whom shall be from the minority party and nominated by the minority party leader appointed by the speaker of the house of representatives b one member of the senate appointed by the president of the senate members of the committee shall receive mileage at the legislative rate when attending to the duties of the committee duties the committee shall study the impacts of outdoor working conditions in new hampshire s heat and cold and illness and the injuries that may be caused by such conditions and such other related issues as the committee deems necessary the committee may consult with and solicit testimony from any individual or organization with information relevant to the committee s objective chairperson quorum the members of the study committee shall elect a chairperson from among the members the first meeting of the committee shall be called by the house member the first meeting of the committee shall be held within days of the effective date of this section three members of the committee shall constitute a quorum report the committee shall report its findings and any recommendations for proposed legislation to the speaker of the house of representatives the president of the senate the house clerk the senate clerk the chairperson of the house labor industrial and rehabilitative services committee the senate commerce committee and the governor and the state library on or before november
